Reviews.Title: “Clean, good value, excellent breakfast”
Reviews.Author: jenesaisfckall
Reviews.Content: stayed third time recently found hotel excellent value money reasonable size beds comfortable clean breakfast spectacularly freshly cooked couple minor quibbles coffee served vacuum flasks meant thoroughly stewed time building fraying edges little hotel apparently close renovations doubt remedy latter issue hoped refurbed hotel wont prices

Reviews.Title: “A definite improvement!”
Reviews.Author: Richard B
Reviews.Content: visit 2 ago particularly memorable pleasantly surprised hotel undergoing improvements manager staff comfortable beds english breakfast remember previous stay bit creaks night major useful location

Reviews.Title: “Good location. Pretty Good.”
Reviews.Author: BaldEagleHarrogate
Reviews.Content: pleasant hotel recently facelift water pumped night pump heard adjacent taps am light sleeper aware real average size shower breakfast staff pleasant car park

Reviews.Title: “Noise from the boiler, cardboard walls and tin can windows makes sleep impossible!”
Reviews.Author: beakeypower_79
Reviews.Content: similar story review stayed wife hospital reason booked hotel sleep 3 hour drive home day didnt fancy driving decent nights sleep chair bed total waste money booked 2 single functional fair reflection price stayed 8 mother law hall cavity wall head board head noisy loudly rumbled everytime tap constantly night loud car engine idle tired bed headphones earplugs tried sleep tossed 2 guys girl checked door loud issue walls appear card thin 45 mins 1 hour traffic starts aluminum windows useless sat road noisy met mother law breakfat discovered stay exhausted couple hours sleep honestly sleeping car complained morning im expecting money clean nights sleep simple clean fair dont bother coming sleep acted supprised claimed heard noise persisted boiler telling owner sorted exactly proves issues chance noise getting dressed 4 morning confronting drunk guys door service exhausted tired flat refused pay bill eventually protest agreed £75 instead £110 tired argue lady recepton ownermanager call day waited 34 days bothered called appologised wouldnt bothered log register didnt

Reviews.Title: “Very good value B&B”
Reviews.Author: LandBli
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights february 2011 husband ensuite clean expecting value bb reception wasnt arrived ring buzzer wait reception found friendly funny possibly people wrong breakfast included price bargain lots choice overall recommend hotel pleased stay comfortable clean tidy

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and cheerful”
Reviews.Author: heathersun
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night cheerful basic clean tv power shower breakfast morning tasty staff reception friendly morning kitchen staff bit rude maybe bad morning hotel stay nights easy centre london

Reviews.Title: “Grumpy staff”
Reviews.Author: 5Tim5
Reviews.Content: received phone call mobile hours arriving check planning stay assumed reception finally reception locked people waiting foyer finally reception wearing food stained tee shirt bad mood couldnt understand triggered journey greeted unpleasant bad wouldnt recommend paid stay

HotelInfo.Name: Muswell Hill Guest House
HotelInfo.Address: 73 Muswell Hill Rd, London N10 3HT, England
